The specific scene in the Cadbury egg ad: sex couple sharing a crème-filled sweet was identified and described.
The petition launched by the Spanish con: which called for the withdrawal of the advertisement, was mentioned, along with the number of signatures it received.
The content of the petition: including the claim that the advertisement featured a "highly-charged sexually provocative act" and was described as "disgusting and off-putting," was highlighted.
Cadbury: s defense of the advertisement, stating that the couple in the ad is dating in real life and that the advertisement represents those who enjoy Cadbury eggs, was provided.
